juice.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this
juice.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
juice.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the liquid that comes out of meat when it is cooked
